desc: Welcome to the Fishermen’s Net. We are a hardworking Maine family business that is proud to celebrate it’s American and Vietnamese heritage. It is our goal to bring the highest quality Maine seafood to Maine families and families everywhere in our country. We know Seafood, with over 30 years experience.

layout.text: After owning a seafood farm for more than 30 years in Vietnam raising tiger shrimp, fish and escargot, my family moved to America and continuing our passion with the ocean with this seafood store. We offer fresh seafood from Portland, Maine. Our specialty is live Maine lobster shipped to your door within 24-hour that is caught handley from local fishermen.
